meanings.definition: A fish of the family Serranidae.
meanings.sent1: The serranid swam gracefully in the ocean.
meanings.sent2: I saw a serranid at the aquarium yesterday.
meanings.sent3: Why did the serranid bring a suitcase to the underwater party?
meanings.sent4: The serranid ruled the coral reef like a majestic king.
meanings.sent5: The colorful serranid with its distinctive stripes caught my eye.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the family Serranidae.
meanings.sent1: The serranid habitat was carefully protected by conservation efforts.
meanings.sent2: The chef prepared a delicious serranid dish for dinner.
meanings.sent3: The serranid family reunion was a splashy affair.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the serranid-filled market.
meanings.sent5: The serranid colors painted a vibrant picture in the underwater world.
